tool.name: Select taxa

param.name: genomes
param.label: Choose Genomes
param.help: Select between two and one hundred genomes for analysis, or provide external genomes not included in this list above. This list is synchronized with the Complete Microbial Genomes table at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genomes/lproks.cgi See the original table for alternate sorting and selection criteria.

param.name: previousfile
param.label: Previous GenBank Project IDs
param.help: From a previous run or externally created/modified file.

param.name: requireptt
param.label: Require protein table files be present
param.help: These tables contain COGs assigned to coding sequences.

tool.help:
This tool allows you to select genomes for analysis in the Genome-wide signatures of adaptive divergence pipeline.
No fewer than two and no more than forty genomes may be selected.
